body:
SIT Restricted

Dear students,

Please be informed that the Higher Education Community Bursary/Higher Education Bursary is estimated to be disbursed by 31 October 2024 for Trimester 1. The bursary will be used to offset any outstanding fees (where applicable) at the point of disbursement. Any balance will be credited to your bank account. If you have yet to set up your credit bank account in IN4SIT, please do so as soon as possible.

For enquiries on bank account setup or disbursement matters, please contact Student Finance at studentfinance@singaporetech.edu.sg<mailto:studentfinance@singaporetech.edu.sg>.

If you have applied for the donated scholarships and/or bursaries, please note that the outcomes will be released progressively in batches once available. Please check your SIT email regularly for updates.

For enquiries on financial aid application, please contact Admissions and Financial Aid at fas@singaporetech.edu.sg<mailto:fas@singaporetech.edu.sg>.

Thank you.

Regards,
Admissions and Financial Aid
